techmeme.title: As digital assets go more mainstream, memecoins like PNUT, named after a euthanised pet squirrel, show how the information ecosystem is changing in finance (Gillian Tett/Financial Times)
A look at Chatbot Arena, which now ranks over 170 AI models and was launched in 2023 by two UCB researchers who hope to grow the project into a Wikipedia of AI (Miles Kruppa/Wall Street Journal)
Meta says there are no plans to release its AI-powered coding tool Metamate externally; Metamate lacks the more autonomous, agent-like features of rivals' tools (Financial Times)
An analysis of US FEC data: Trump received $273.2M in donations from tech executives and VCs, including $242.6M from Elon Musk, while Harris received $120.9M (The Guardian)
Sources: ByteDance has taken an early lead in the generative AI race in China by poaching top talent from rivals and becoming Nvidia's biggest buyer in China (Financial Times)
